mapper.select: SELECT S.*, C.CUSTOMER_NAME FROM SALES S JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON S.CUSTOMER_CODE = C.CUSTOMER_CODE WHERE ORDER_PERMIT = 'Y' ORDER BY SALE_CODE
SELECT SD.*, V.VENDOR_NAME FROM SALE_DETAILS SD JOIN VENDORS V ON SD.VENDOR_CODE = V.VENDOR_CODE WHERE SALE_CODE = #{saleCode} ORDER BY SALE_DETAIL_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SALES ( SALE_CODE , SALE_DATE , CUSTOMER_CODE , SALE_COST , DELIVERY_ADDR , DELIVERY_STATUS , DELIVERY_DATE , PAY_STATUS , ORDER_PERMIT ) VALUES ( #{saleCode} , SYSDATE , #{customerCode} , #{saleCost} , #{deliveryAddr} , 'N' , #{deliveryDate} , 'N' , 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT S.*, C.CUSTOMER_NAME FROM SALES S JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON S.CUSTOMER_CODE = C.CUSTOMER_CODE WHERE ORDER_PERMIT = 'N' ORDER BY SALE_DATE DESC
SELECT SD.*, V.VENDOR_NAME FROM SALE_DETAILS SD JOIN VENDORS V ON SD.VENDOR_CODE = V.VENDOR_CODE WHERE SALE_CODE = #{saleCode} ORDER BY SALE_DETAIL_CODE

SELECT S.*, C.CUSTOMER_NAME FROM SALES S JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON S.CUSTOMER_CODE = C.CUSTOMER_CODE WHERE ORDER_PERMIT = 'N'
AND SALE_CODE LIKE '%' || #{saleCode} || '%'
AND C.CUSTOMER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{customerName} || '%'
AND TRUNC(SALE_DATE) = TO_DATE(#{saleDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND SALE_COST = #{saleCost}
AND DELIVERY_ADDR LIKE '%' || #{deliveryAddr} || '%'
ORDER BY SALE_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM STOCK_ONHANDS WHERE ITEM_CODE = #{saleItemCode} ORDER BY ITEM_CODE

SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(S.SALE_DATE), 'YYYY-MM') AS "saleDay", SUM(SD.SALE_PRICE * SD.SALE_QTY) AS "saleSum" FROM SALES S JOIN SALE_DETAILS SD ON S.SALE_CODE = SD.SALE_CODE JOIN ITEMS I ON SD.SALE_ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE WHERE S.ORDER_PERMIT = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(S.SALE_DATE), 'YYYY') = #{saleDate} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TRUNC(S.SALE_DATE), 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY 1

SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(S.SALE_DATE)) AS "saleDay", SUM((SD.SALE_PRICE) * SD.SALE_QTY) AS "saleSum" FROM SALES S JOIN SALE_DETAILS SD ON S.SALE_CODE = SD.SALE_CODE JOIN ITEMS I ON SD.SALE_ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE WHERE S.ORDER_PERMIT = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(S.SALE_DATE), 'YYYY-MM') = #{saleDate} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TRUNC(S.SALE_DATE)) ORDER BY 1

SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(S.SALE_DATE), 'YYYY-MM') AS "profitDay", SUM((SD.SALE_PRICE - I.SUPPLY_PRICE) * SD.SALE_QTY) AS "profitSum" FROM SALES S JOIN SALE_DETAILS SD ON S.SALE_CODE = SD.SALE_CODE JOIN ITEMS I ON SD.SALE_ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE WHERE S.ORDER_PERMIT = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(S.SALE_DATE), 'YYYY') = #{saleDate} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TRUNC(S.SALE_DATE), 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY 1

SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(S.SALE_DATE)) AS "profitDay", SUM((SD.SALE_PRICE - I.SUPPLY_PRICE) * SD.SALE_QTY) AS "profitSum" FROM SALES S JOIN SALE_DETAILS SD ON S.SALE_CODE = SD.SALE_CODE JOIN ITEMS I ON SD.SALE_ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE WHERE S.ORDER_PERMIT = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(S.SALE_DATE), 'YYYY-MM') = #{saleDate} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TRUNC(S.SALE_DATE)) ORDER BY 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT sd.SALE_ITEM_NAME AS "saleItem", SUM(sd.SALE_QTY) AS "saleQty" FROM sales s JOIN sale_details sd ON s.sale_code = sd.sale_code WHERE s.ORDER_PERMIT = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(S.SALE_DATE), 'YYYY') = #{saleDate} GROUP BY sd.SALE_ITEM_NAME ORDER BY 2 DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SD.SALE_ITEM_NAME AS "saleItem" , SUM(SD.SALE_QTY) AS "saleQty" FROM SALES S JOIN SALE_DETAILS SD ON S.SALE_CODE = SD.SALE_CODE WHERE S.ORDER_PERMIT = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(S.SALE_DATE), 'YYYY-MM') = #{saleDate} GROUP BY SD.SALE_ITEM_NAME ORDER BY 2 DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C.CUSTOMER_NAME AS "customerName" , SUM(SD.SALE_QTY) AS "saleQty" FROM CUSTOMERS C JOIN SALES S ON C.CUSTOMER_CODE = S.CUSTOMER_CODE JOIN SALE_DETAILS SD ON S.SALE_CODE = SD.SALE_CODE WHERE S.ORDER_PERMIT = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(S.SALE_DATE), 'YYYY') = #{saleDate} GROUP BY c.CUSTOMER_NAME ORDER BY 2 DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C.CUSTOMER_NAME AS "customerName" , SUM(SD.SALE_QTY) AS "saleQty" FROM CUSTOMERS C JOIN SALES S ON C.CUSTOMER_CODE = S.CUSTOMER_CODE JOIN SALE_DETAILS SD ON S.SALE_CODE = SD.SALE_CODE WHERE S.ORDER_PERMIT = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(S.SALE_DATE), 'YYYY-MM') = #{saleDate} GROUP BY C.CUSTOMER_NAME ORDER BY 2 DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT IT.ITEM_NAME AS "itemName" , LV.DESCRIPTIONS AS "itemCategory" , SO.ONHAND_QTY AS "itemQty" , SD.SALE_PRICE AS "itemPrice" , SUM(SD.SALE_QTY) AS "saleQty" FROM LOOKUP_VALUES LV JOIN ( SELECT SUBSTR(ITEM_CODE, 1, 1) ITEM_CATEGORY , ITEM_CODE , ITEM_NAME FROM ITEMS ) IT ON LV.LOOKUP_CODE = IT.ITEM_CATEGORY JOIN SALE_DETAILS SD ON IT.ITEM_CODE = SD.SALE_ITEM_CODE JOIN SALES S ON S.SALE_CODE = SD.SALE_CODE JOIN STOCK_ONHANDS SO ON SO.ITEM_CODE = SD.SALE_ITEM_CODE WHERE LV.LOOKUP = 'ITEM_GROUP1' AND S.ORDER_PERMIT = 'Y' AND (S.SALE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 30 AND SYSDATE) GROUP BY IT.ITEM_NAME, LV.DESCRIPTIONS, SO.ONHAND_QTY, SD.SALE_PRICE ORDER BY IT.ITEM_NAME ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 20
